I just installed Cantera 1.5.4 using binary installer, Python 2.3.4 
and Numeric-23.1.win32-py2.3. When I run demos using IDLE, I get the 
following error message: 

-----------
   Traceback (most recent call last):
     File "C:\Program Files\Cantera\Cantera154
\demos\Python\npflame1.py", line 7, in ?
       from Cantera import *
     File "C:\Python23\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\__init__.py", line  
9, in ?
       from exceptions import *
     File "C:\Python23\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\exceptions.py", 
line 5, in ?
       import _cantera
   ImportError: No module named _numpy
------------

It sounds like I haven't installed numpy, but I did install it and 
added the path under "SYSTEM" control.
I also tried to run demos with Matlab after I set the path - but 
this one is not working either. I get the error message 
saying "Undefined function or variable." I'm running demos in the 
following directory:

C:\Program Files\Cantera\Cantera154\toolbox\cantera\cantera

Could anyone help me making this work? Thank you!
